After first shot, further shots may be fired continuously.

4f09f3f0-d594-48ae-954d-cb5b88a9a9ab.notes: Unshaped rocks and stones suitable for slings, heavy slings, and stone-launching sticks can be found for free, but they’re less accurate: -1 to hit.; Can fire stones (TL0) or lead bullets (TL2). Lead bullets give +1 damage and double range.

After  one end is fully discharged, start over at the lowest values for the other end. Reloading the inner rounds takes 60 seconds per round rather than 30.
